page.title: 07A HORTON CHILD'S HOBBIES
page.content: In my spare time I like watching birds, butterflies and woodland creatures.I like to go for a walk in the wood and watch the creatures. Every time I go into the wood I take a piece of paper and try to draw it. When I get home I make a chart of all the things I have seen. When I am painting I like trying to match the butterflies' colours. Sometimes I take photographs.I like collecting things, mainly shells and little pots and ornaments. I enjoy playing on the recorder or the organ. Sometimes I go to my friend's house to play with our dolls. I also collect dolls. I have some dolls from other countries, some baby dolls and a Cabbage Patch Kid.She has long ginger plaits and a squashed face and she wears a nappy. She was in an advertisement on television. Alexandra Dando.
